[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpuvo24gcw[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA heap-buffer-overflow was detected by AddressSanitizer during fuzzing of the [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mMongoose networking code. The overflow occurs in the function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdefined in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/net_builtin.c` at line [0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which reads one byte past the end of a [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap‐allocated buffer. The error is triggered via the fuzzing harness [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` in `test/fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, leading to an out‐of‐bounds read in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mICMP packet processing.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Issue  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  During a fuzzing run with libFuzzer, AddressSanitizer logged a one‐byte [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap‐buffer‐overflow in the function `rx_icmp`. The offending read is at [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m`.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Vulnerability type  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Heap-buffer-overflow [0m[1;39m([0m[39mmemory-safety violation[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: a one‐byte read beyond the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated buffer boundary.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Key observations  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. The crash is reached through the fuzz harness entry point [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` [0m[1;39m([0m[39min `mongoose/test/fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, which allocates a packet [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer via `malloc`.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. The fuzzing engine drives the code by calling `mg_tcpip_rx`, which in turn [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalls `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. The overflow address [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is immediately past a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte region [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mallocated for the packet.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. The sanitizer report’s stack trace shows the read occurs when `rx_icmp` [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mattempts to access packet data without sufficient bounds checking.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Areas for investigation  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The implementation of `rx_icmp` in `src/net_builtin.c`, around line [0m[1;36m385[0m[39m, to [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39midentify how packet lengths and offsets are calculated.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The packet structure definitions used by `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mlikely in `net_builtin.c` [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor associated headers[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, to confirm buffer size expectations.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The calling sequence in `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`src/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:897[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, to see how [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mincoming packet data is passed to `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • The fuzzing harness [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mongoose/test/fuzz.c`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to understand how the input buffer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis constructed, allocated, and handed off to the networking code.  [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Any boundary or length checks in ICMP packet handling logic, including header [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparsing and payload reads.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m390[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Overview of the root cause  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - In mg_tcpip_rx [0m[1;39m([0m[39msrc/net_builtin.c around lines [0m[1;36m887[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m894[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the code overrides [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe packet’s raw length from the IP header, but only checks that it’s ≥ Ethernet + [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mminimum IP header [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m+[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - It then special-cases IP headers with options [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL >[0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m by pointing the payload[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart to `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ihl*[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m` without verifying that the buffer actually [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcontains `ihl*[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m` bytes of IP header.  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This can move the payload pointer beyond the end of the heap-allocated packet,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39myielding an oversized `pkt.pay.len` and leading to one-byte [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor more[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m out-of-bounds[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreads later in rx_icmp.[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch location  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - File: src/net_builtin.c  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Function: mg_tcpip_rx  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Original lines [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m887[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m894[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m887[0m[39m: pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m888[0m[39m: [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m889[0m[39m: if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mTruncated[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m890[0m[39m: if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m891[0m[39m: if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m892[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m893[0m[39m: else[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;36m894[0m[39m:     [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Detailed patch strategy  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a. Compute and validate the IP header length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m immediately after setting [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt.raw.len`.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Extract the low nibble of `pkt.ip->ver` → IHL in [0m[1;36m32[0m[39m-bit words.  [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Convert to bytes: `ip_hlen = ihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Reject any packet where  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         • `ihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39minvalid/minimum header too small[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, or  [0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         • `pkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mbuffer doesn’t hold the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdeclared header[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b. Unify the payload pointer logic  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Whether IHL = [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m or >[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m, you now know `ip_hlen` is safe.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - Replace both branches by a single call:  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      - This preserves the old behavior for [0m[33mIHL[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and safely handles [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptions up to the [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m-bit maximum [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m60[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c. Full pseudo-diff [0m[1;39m([0m[39mno harness, no tests modified[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```diff[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     --- a/src/net_builtin.c[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     +++ b/src/net_builtin.c[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     @@ [0m[1;36m-887[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m11[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m887[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m17[0m[39m @@ static void [0m[1;35mmg_tcpip_rx[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     -  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     -  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     -  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     -    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     -  else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     -    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     +  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     +  if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IPv4[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     +[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     +  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Sanity-check IP header length before slicing payload *[0m[35m/[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     +  uint8_t ihl = pkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[39m;                              [0m[35m/[0m[39m* words *[0m[35m/[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     +  size_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;                             [0m[35m/[0m[39m* bytes *[0m[35m/[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     +  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* ihl<[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m invalid or buffer too small to contain the full header *[0m[35m/[0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     +  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m || pkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     +[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     +  [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Safe to point payload at the end of the validated header *[0m[35m/[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     +  [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By validating `ip_hlen` against the allocated buffer size, we eliminate any [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchance that `mkpay` will advance its pointer beyond the heap allocation.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Unifying the two branches avoids duplicated logic and ensures that the [0m[33mIHL[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcase [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstandard [0m[1;36m20[0m[39m-byte header[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is handled identically to before [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No changes are made to the fuzz harness, rx_icmp, or any external library.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All existing test logic [0m[1;39m([0m[39mincluding malformed or truncated-packet tests[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m will [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstill trigger the same early returns—invalid or too-short packets are simply [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdiscarded.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Side effect: packets claiming very large IP header lengths [0m[1;39m([0m[39meven up to the [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m-bit max of [0m[1;36m60[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m will be dropped if the buffer doesn’t actually contain that [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mmany bytes. This is both safe and RFC-compliant [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpackets must carry their full [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheaders[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This approach is minimal, preserves existing behavior for well-formed packets,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand directly addresses the one-byte OOB read reported by ASan.[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwas applied to the IP‐packet handling in `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, introducing[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexplicit checks on the Internet Header Length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and replacing the previous [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mversion/option logic with bounds checks before slicing out the payload. Despite [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthis change, the same heap-buffer-overflow in `rx_icmp` continues to occur, [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating the issue has not been mitigated by the patch.[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A fuzzing harness feeds raw Ethernet/IP/ICMP data into the Mongoose function [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx`, which demultiplexes to `rx_icmp`.  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- AddressSanitizer reports a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read just beyond a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte allocation at [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maddress `[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Stack trace highlights the failure in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m called from `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:897[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and ultimately [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvia `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mImportant observations in the initial log  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The raw packet length [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt.raw.len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and computed header lengths allow execution[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minto the ICMP path.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The offending read is at the very end of the allocated region, suggesting missing[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor incorrect bounds checking in ICMP message parsing.  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer harness itself only allocates and passes the data — it does not [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mimplement the vulnerable logic.[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In net_builtin.c, at the top of the IPv4 dispatch in `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m887[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, the patch replaces the old version/option check:  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Removes the “if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m” branch.  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  • Adds:  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     – Extract `uint8_t ihl = pkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[39m;`  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     – Compute `size_t ip_hlen = ihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;`  [0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     – Bounds‐check that `ihl >= [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m` and `pkt.raw.len >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mip_hlen`.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     – Call `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The intended effect is to ensure the IP header is entirely present before slicing[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe payload.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mResult of applying the patch  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer run post-patch still crashes with the *exact* same AddressSanitizer [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39merror in `rx_icmp` at net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m.  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The stack trace, memory addresses, and allocation footprint are identical to the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minitial failure, confirming that the patch did not prevent entry into the [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mproblematic ICMP code path.[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for further investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The implementation of `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.c around line [0m[1;36m385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m: its parsing [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlogic and any assumptions about payload size or buffer layout.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- How `pkt.payload` is set by `mkpay` and how `rx_icmp` uses it—particularly any [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindexing or header‐length calculations inside `rx_icmp`.  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Validation steps in `mg_tcpip_rx` for ICMP: after slicing the IP payload, whether[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthere are checks on the ICMP header length and the full ICMP message length [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtype, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcode, checksum, data[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The definitions and uses of fields in the `pkt` structure [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., `pkt.raw.len`, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt.ip->len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to ensure consistent end‐to‐end length calculations.[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ shift[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[32m'[0m[32m[[0m[32m'[0m[39m [0m[32m'!'[0m[39m -v TESTCASE [0m[32m'[0m[32m][0m[32m'[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mTESTCASE[0m[39m=[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpuvo24gcw[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA libFuzzer run on the mongoose networking code triggered an AddressSanitizer [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow in function `rx_icmp` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, where a one‐byte [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mread occurred just past the end of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte buffer. A patch was introduced that:  [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `rx_icmp`, early‐returns if `pkt->pay.len` is smaller than an ICMP header.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the ICMP dispatch path [0m[1;39m([0m[39mproto [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, reassigns `pkt->icmp` to the payload buffer,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks `pay.len` again, and advances the payload pointer past the header.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the IPv4 path, adds an explicit IHL check, computes the IP header length in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbytes, validates it, and calls `mkpay` with the correct offset.  [0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter applying these changes, the same heap‐buffer‐overflow in `rx_icmp` was [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreported, indicating the patch did not prevent the invalid read.[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer invoked the code via `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`, feeding a short packet [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mleading to a call chain: `mg_tcpip_rx → rx_icmp`.  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `rx_icmp`, the code reads `pkt->icmp->type` without ensuring the ICMP header [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlies entirely within `pkt->pay.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m…pkt->pay.len−[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m`.  [0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- ASan reports a one‐byte read at the exact boundary of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte heap allocation, [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconfirming an out‐of‐bounds access.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mKey Observations  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The crash address [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is “[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m bytes after” a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m‐byte region [0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m[[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m150[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m0x[0m[33m...[0m[1;36m172[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The original code used `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` for proto [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithout checking that the payload length covered `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The `mkpay` helper advances the data pointer but does not automatically shrink [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pay.len` or revalidate bounds for subsequent reads.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. In `static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[33m...[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m380[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Inserted  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. In the ICMP branch of `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mproto [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, around line [0m[1;36m799[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Changed assignment to  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.buf;[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Added the same length check and then  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->pay.buf + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. In the IPv4 handling block [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround line [0m[1;36m887[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Extracted IHL [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, converted to bytes, validated `ihl >= [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand overall packet length.[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replaced the old `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` logic with  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     ```[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mResult After Patch  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A second fuzzing run produced the _same_ ASan heap-buffer-overflow at [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m` in `rx_icmp`, with identical buffer bounds and allocation size.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- No new crash location or different stack trace appeared, indicating the added [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mchecks did not cover the faulting path.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The initialization and updates of `pkt->pay.len` and `pkt->pay.buf` across all [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparsing stages, especially after `mkpay` calls.  [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Other code paths leading to `rx_icmp` that may bypass the new header‐size check. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The contract between `mkpay` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich resets `pkt->pay.buf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and subsequent length [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidations for layered protocol parsers.  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Any inlined or alternate ICMP parsing routines in `net_builtin.c` that were not [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcovered by the patch.[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
