[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:836[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m840[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m836[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m837[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m838[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m839[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"IP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m840[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m || pkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m58[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m390[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:800[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m806[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m806[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:882[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m894[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m882[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m883[0m[39m:    pkt.ip = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m884[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m885[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncate frame to what IP header tells us[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m886[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m887[0m[39m:      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m888[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:836[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m840[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m836[0m[39m:[0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m837[0m[39m:[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m838[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_ip6[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m839[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"IP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m840[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m || pkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m58[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Overview and Root Causes  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Two independent parsing paths [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIPv4 and IPv6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m funnel into the same `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction, but neither path guarantees that `pkt->pay.buf` and `pkt->pay.len` are [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maligned and bounded exactly around the ICMP header before `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` reads [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp->type`.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The IPv4 IHL‐based payload slicing was fixed in the last patch, but only in [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe mg_tcpip_rx “ethernet → IPv4 → rx_ip” leg. The ICMP dispatch inside the [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m**rx_ip** stage was patched _only_ for proto‐[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, and the entirely separate IPv6 path[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip6`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m was never updated.  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` itself still reads `pkt->icmp->type` before independently [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mverifying [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor re‐deriving[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that the ICMP header is in‐bounds. That means any code [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpath that bypasses the patched dispatch [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g. IPv6 or a future refactoring[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m will [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstill overflow.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The root cause is that `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` trusts a previously‐set `pkt->icmp` pointer[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mfrom either IPv4 or IPv6 dispatch[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, and then proceeds to read and write fields [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwithout locally validating that the memory is fully within the original packet [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer.[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. High-Level Patch Plan  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Refactor `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` so that it:  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Always re‐derives the in‐coming ICMP header pointer as `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt->pay.buf`.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Immediately checks `pkt->pay.len >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` before any field [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccesses.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Keeps the entire request payload [0m[1;39m([0m[39mheader + data[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in local variables, then [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconsumes the header internally—eliminating the need for callers to `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` before[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minvoking `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Emits a proper ICMP echo‐reply by copying data and computing the checksum,[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mas before.  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. In both dispatching paths:  [0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. IPv4 → rx_ip [0m[1;39m([0m[39m“proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m”[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         – Change `pkt->icmp = …; [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, …[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39m…[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           to simply `[0m[35m/[0m[39m* no mkpay *[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39m…[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[1;39m([0m[39mall header‐consumption and safety checks now live in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. IPv6 → rx_ip6 [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m || [0m[1;36m58[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         – Apply the identical change: remove `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 +[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, remove [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, replace with `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. Remove the now‐obsolete assignments to `pkt->icmp` and avoid calling [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` for ICMP at the dispatch sites.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Detailed Steps  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. In `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`:  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      a. At the top, declare:  [0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```c[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t orig_len = pkt->pay.len;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         char *orig_buf = pkt->pay.buf;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         struct icmp *in_icmp;[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      b. Immediately do:  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```c[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39morig_len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*in_icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         in_icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m orig_buf;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```  [0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      c. Read `in_icmp->type` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mand `pkt->ip`, `pkt->ip->dst`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m only after this bound[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcheck.  [0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      d. Compute `reply_data_len = orig_len - [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*in_icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;`  [0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      e. Compute Ethernet+IP+ICMP header overhead, check `ifp->tx.len` space, clamp[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`reply_data_len` as needed.  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      f. Call the IPv4‐reply helper [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`tx_ip`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m exactly as before, copy `reply_data` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfrom `orig_buf + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*in_icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` into the new packet, set `[0m[33mtype[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m`, `[0m[33mcode[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m0[0m[39m`, [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcompute checksum.  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      g. **Do not** call `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` or modify `pkt->pay` inside `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`. This [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfunction only _reads_ the incoming ICMP request and _generates_ a new packet via [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`tx_ip` and `[0m[1;35msend_ether[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor equivalent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. In the IPv4 dispatch [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_tcpip_rx → rx_ip`, around line [0m[1;36m800[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      a. Replace the block:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```c[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->pay.buf;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->pay.buf + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         with simply:[0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```c[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      b. Remove any assignments to `pkt->icmp` or calls to `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` in this [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbranch.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. In the IPv6 dispatch [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip6`, around the `proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m || [0m[1;36m58[0m[39m` case[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:  [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      a. Replace the existing code that sets `pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip6 [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, checks `pkt->pay.len`, does `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, then `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, with a single:[0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```c[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         ```[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      b. Ensure IPv6 header‐length checks remain [0m[1;39m([0m[39mi.e., skip past IPv6 [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbase/extension headers in `pkt->pay.buf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, but do not `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` for ICMP—let [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` do the safety checks.  [0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Why This Works and Preserves Functionality  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Single Source of Truth**: All ICMP parsing, bound‐checking, and [0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader‐consumption live in one function [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, so no dispatch‐site can [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mforget a check.  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Eliminates mkpay Interactions**: By removing `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` from the ICMP path, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwe avoid the complexity of “pay‐len before vs. after header” and pointer‐mismatch [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbugs.  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Backward Compatibility**: UDP, TCP, and other protocols keep using `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexactly as before; only ICMP paths change. All existing tests for ICMP echo/reply [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mwill continue to pass because we copy exactly the same fields/payload and recompute[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same checksum.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Performance Impact**: A single extra bound‐check per ICMP packet [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpay.len [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvs. header size[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is negligible.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Side‐Effects and Mitigation**:  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     – ICMPv4 and ICMPv6 both arrive in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, but our current implementation[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconstructs an IPv4‐based “echo reply.” If ICMPv6 was intended to be looped back by [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe same code, you may wish to split into `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp4[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp6[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` eventually.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mFor now, `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` will quietly ignore anything that doesn’t look like an ICMPv4 [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mEcho Request [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtype [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     – Ensure that after we remove `pkt->icmp` assignments, no other code relies on[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthat field. A quick search confirms it's only used in dispatch + `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Summary  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Refactor** `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to be self‐sufficient: always re‐derive the ICMP [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader pointer from `pkt->pay.buf`, perform one bound check, then parse and reply. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Remove** redundant/out-of-sync assignments and `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` calls in both IPv4 [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand IPv6 dispatch paths.  [0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - **Preserve** existing echo‐reply semantics and avoid touching fuzzing harness [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mor tests.  [0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This unified approach prevents any future dispatch path from accidentally [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalling `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` without the necessary safety checks.  [0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/28/25 01:01:17][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.ANALYZE                  ]8;id=512425;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=203026;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         +    if [1m([0mpkt->pay.len [1m<[0m[39m [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    struct icmp *in_icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.buf;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Only handle ICMP Echo Request [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtype [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m destined to us *[0m[35m/[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39min_icmp->type != [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m || pkt->ip == NULL || pkt->ip->dst != ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Compute available payload size for reply *[0m[35m/[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    size_t data_len = pkt->pay.len - [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata_len > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m data_len = space;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Build reply IP packet with ICMP header + data *[0m[35m/[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;35mmemset[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;        [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Set csum to [0m[1;36m0[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, pkt->pay.buf, plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Copy RX payload to TX[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[39micmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m-  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + data_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    struct icmp *out_icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Populate ICMP Echo Reply header *[0m[35m/[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    out_icmp->type = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    out_icmp->code = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    out_icmp->id   = in_icmp->id;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    out_icmp->seq  = in_icmp->seq;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Copy ICMP payload data *[0m[35m/[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mout_icmp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+           [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39min_icmp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+           data_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Compute ICMP checksum and send *[0m[35m/[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    out_icmp->csum = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    out_icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m out_icmp, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdata_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+    [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + data_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m [0m                                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m static void [0m[1;35mrx_dhcp_client[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m@@ [0m[1;36m-799[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m9[0m[39m +[0m[1;36m813[0m[39m,[0m[1;36m7[0m[39m @@[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Addressable:           [0m[1;36m00[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Partially addressable: [0m[1;36m01[0m[39m [0m[1;36m02[0m[39m [0m[1;36m03[0m[39m [0m[1;36m04[0m[39m [0m[1;36m05[0m[39m [0m[1;36m06[0m[39m [0m[1;36m07[0m[39m [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Heap left redzone:       fa[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Freed heap region:       fd[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack left redzone:      f1[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack mid redzone:       f2[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack right redzone:     f3[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack after return:      f5[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Stack use after scope:   f8[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Global redzone:          f9[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Global init order:       f6[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Poisoned by user:        f7[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Container overflow:      fc[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Array cookie:            ac[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Intra object redzone:    bb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  ASan internal:           fe[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Left alloca redzone:     ca[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  Right alloca redzone:    cb[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m==[0m[1;36m18[0m[39m==ABORTING[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msubprocess command returned a non-zero exit status: [0m[1;36m1[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpuvo24gcw[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe fuzzer uncovered a heap-buffer-overflow in the function `rx_icmp` [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when processing crafted ICMP packets. The overflow occurs [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbecause the code reads beyond the allocated packet payload buffer. A patch was [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mintroduced that adds explicit bounds checks on the payload length, reworks the ICMP[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader parsing, and centralizes ICMP dispatch logic. After applying the patch, the [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msame heap-buffer-overflow is still reported at the new entry point in `rx_icmp`, [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mindicating that the root read-past-end still persists.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mInitial Issue  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- A fuzzing run triggered an AddressSanitizer error inside `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m.  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The report shows a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read just past the end of a [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte region allocated [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfor `pkt->pay.buf`.  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The offending access is `in_icmp->type` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor equivalent[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m without sufficient length[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalidation, leading to a heap-buffer-overflow.  [0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Stack trace: `rx_icmp` ← `mg_tcpip_rx` ← `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` ← libFuzzer [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minternals.[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mImportant Observations  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The packet payload buffer [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`pkt->pay.buf`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is only [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m bytes, but the code reads [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mat least [0m[1;36m35[0m[39m bytes when checking or copying ICMP fields.  [0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The original code computed header lengths [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`hlen`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and compared payload length [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`plen`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to available space in the transmit buffer, but never ensured the incoming [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload was large enough for a full ICMP header before accessing fields.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The dispatch sites for IPv4 and IPv6 in `mg_tcpip_rx` and `rx_ip6` performed [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpointer casts like `[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` without ensuring `pkt->pay.len >= [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` before calling `rx_icmp`.[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mPatch Attempt  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In `rx_icmp`:[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Added an early return if `pkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Introduced a local `in_icmp` pointer to `pkt->pay.buf`.[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Filtered to only Echo Request [0m[1;39m([0m[39mtype [0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m destined to the interface.[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Derived reply packet lengths [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`data_len`, `hlen`, `space`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, capped data to [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mavailable TX space.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Built a reply header `out_icmp`, copied payload, calculated checksum, and sent [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvia `ether_output`.[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- In the IPv4 dispatch [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_tcpip_rx`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and IPv6 dispatch [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip6`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Removed direct `pkt->icmp` assignments and calls to `mkpay`.[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m  - Replaced with a call to the updated `rx_icmp` without rechecking header size.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mLog After Patch  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The fuzzer was re-run with the same input.[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The sanitizer still reports a heap-buffer-overflow at `net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstart of `rx_icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, on the same byte offset.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- The stack trace now enters the new bounds-checked code path but fails immediately[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mon the first access [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`in_icmp->type`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, indicating `pkt->pay.len` was still below [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` or the wrong offset is used.[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAreas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. **Payload Length and Offset Calculation**  [0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - How `pkt->pay.len` and `pkt->pay.buf` are initialized by `mkpay` or earlier in[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`mg_tcpip_rx` for both IPv4 and IPv6 paths.  [0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether the offset from `pkt->ip` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor `pkt->ip6`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to `pkt->pay.buf` matches [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe assumed buffer layout in `rx_icmp`.[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. **mkpay Function and Packet Buffer Setup**  [0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The implementation of `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp+[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`: how it adjusts `pkt->pay.buf`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand `pay.len`.  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Any redzones or alignment that could cause the reported read to land just [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moutside the allocated region.[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. **IPv6 vs. IPv4 Dispatch Differences**  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Uniformity of header-size checks when handling ICMPv4 vs. ICMPv6 [0m[1;39m([0m[39mprotocol [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvs. [0m[1;36m58[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Whether the same code path is used for both and if `rx_icmp` correctly handles[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthe differences.[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. **Header Parsing Logic**  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Consistency in how the code derives the ICMP header pointer from `pkt->ip` or [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->ip6`.  [0m                                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Verification that `pkt->ip->len` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor IPv6 payload length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m matches the buffer [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength and is validated before use.[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. **Test Harness Assumptions**  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Although the harness is not the root cause, confirm that the test input [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mgeneration and `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput` setup are not producing malformed `pkt` [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mstates that bypass normal packet parsing.[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA review of these areas will give a holistic view of how packet headers and payload[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffers are managed and where additional validation or offset corrections are [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mneeded to prevent out-of-bounds reads.[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m+ [0m[33mFUZZER[0m[39m=[0m[35mfuzz[0m                                                                       [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/out/[0m[95mfuzz[0m[39m: Running [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m inputs [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[1;35mtime[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m each.[0m                                       [2m                [0m
