[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m798[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->tcp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct tcp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m799[0m[39m:    struct mg_connection *c = [0m[1;35mgetpeer[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp->mgr, pkt, false[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m800[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mc[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_error[0m[1;39m([0m[39mc, [0m[32m"Received fragmented packet"[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m801[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m802[0m[39m:    pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m803[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m804[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m805[0m[39m:    [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:382[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m390[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m382[0m[39m:static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m383[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m [0m[1;35mMG_DEBUG[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[32m"ICMP %d"[0m[39m, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mint[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m len[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m384[0m[39m:  if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->icmp->type == [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m && pkt->ip != NULL && pkt->ip->dst == ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m385[0m[39m:    size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m386[0m[39m:    size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen, plen = pkt->pay.len;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m387[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mplen > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m plen = space;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m388[0m[39m:    struct ip *ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m389[0m[39m:                          [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + plen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m390[0m[39m:    struct icmp *icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Root Cause Analysis  [0m                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The heap overflow is not in `rx_icmp` itself but in the upstream payload‐setup[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`mkpay`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when parsing IPv4 headers with a bad IHL [0m[1;39m([0m[39mInternet Header Length[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m nibble.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - If the low [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m bits of `pkt->ip->ver` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mthe IHL[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are > [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m, the old code [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39munconditionally did  [0m                                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt->ip + ihl*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     without checking that `ihl*[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m` bytes of header are actually present in the raw [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbuffer. A fuzzer can set IHL to, say, [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m or [0m[1;36m15[0m[39m, causing `mkpay`’s pointer `p` to lie[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpast `raw.buf+raw.len`. `pkt->pay.len` then wraps to a large value, bypasses [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp`’s header‐size check, and `in_icmp->type` reads off‐by‐one.  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Preserve Existing Functionality  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We must still support IPv4 options [0m[1;39m([0m[39mIHL ≥ [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m when the packet really carries [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mthem.  [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - We must not touch the fuzzer harness or any external library.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `rx_icmp`’s early return on `pkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is correct [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mand should remain.  [0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Proposal  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Unify and Harden IPv4‐mkpay Logic in `mg_tcpip_rx` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnet_builtin.c around line[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m882[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - Replace the two‐branch IHL test with explicit IHL validation:  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```c[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Before:  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        * if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m  [0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        *   [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ihl*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        * else  [0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        *   [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;  [0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m        *[0m[35m/[0m[39m  [0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       uint8_t ihl = pkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Minimum header length is [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m words [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m20[0m[39m bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; reject invalid IHL *[0m[35m/[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;  [0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Ensure the entire IPv4 header [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwith options[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is in the raw data *[0m[35m/[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Now safely compute payload start and remaining length *[0m[35m/[0m                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - This guarantees that `mkpay`’s pointer `p` never exceeds [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`&pkt->raw.buf[0m[1;39m[[0m[39mpkt->raw.len[0m[1;39m][0m[39m` and that `pkt->pay.len` accurately reflects only [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mvalid bytes.[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. Retain and Rely on `rx_icmp`’s Bounds Check  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - In `rx_icmp`, keep the early check:[0m                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```c[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       struct icmp *in_icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->pay.buf;[0m                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - This prevents any further header access when the payload is too small.[0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. [0m[1;39m([0m[39mOptional[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Mirror IPv6 Safety  [0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - If IPv6‐extension headers are ever processed, similar length checks should [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mbe added before moving `mkpay`’s pointer. For now, the IPv6 code uses a fixed [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m40[0m[39m‐byte header, so verify:[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```c[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     - And let `rx_icmp` continue to enforce `pkt->pay.len >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Why This Works  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By validating the IHL field against the actual buffer length, we eliminate any[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mscenario where `mkpay` can produce a `pay.buf` pointer outside the allocated [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mregion.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `rx_icmp`’s own header‐length gate remains untouched, so legitimate small or [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moption‐free packets still work.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No harness or fuzzing logic is modified; existing tests and fuzzer inputs that[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mconform to valid packet layouts continue to succeed.[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Side Effects and Mitigation  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Malformed IPv4 packets with IHL < [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m or claiming options longer than the [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcaptured frame are now silently dropped, mirroring standard IP stack behavior.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Packet‐loss of truly option‐laden frames only occurs if the captured frame is [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mtruncated [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwhich it must be, otherwise no memory violation[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No broad exception swallowing is introduced.[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. References in Codebase  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The original “truncated‐frame” checks around lines [0m[1;36m884[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m889[0m[39m already guard the [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m_minimum_ header length [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m20[0m[39m B[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m. This patch extends that to the _actual_ header [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - `rx_icmp`’s `pkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` check remains the final [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msafeguard before any dereference of ICMP fields.  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/out/[0m[95mfuzz[0m[39m: Running [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m inputs [0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[1;35mtime[0m[1;39m([0m[39ms[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m each.[0m                                        [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mRunning: [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m                                                                   [2m               [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m=================================================================[0m                    [2m               [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->ip->proto == [0m[1;36m17[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                               [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39mINFO:__main__:Running: docker run --privileged --shm-[0m[33msize[0m[39m=[0m[35m2g[0m[39m --platform linux/amd64[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m--rm -i -e [0m[33mHELPER[0m[39m=[0m[3;92mTrue[0m[39m -e [0m[33mARCHITECTURE[0m[39m=[0m[35mx86_64[0m[39m -v [0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mout[0m[39m -v [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/tmp/[0m[95mtmpuvo24gcw[0m[39m:[0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m -t ghcr.io/aixcc-finals/base-runner:v1.[0m[1;36m3.0[0m[39m reproduce [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m===Evaluation [0m[33mReport[0m[39m===[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m# Evaluation Report[0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Summary[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAn AddressSanitizer report from a libFuzzer run on the Mongoose codebase showed a [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mone‐byte heap-buffer-overflow in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` when processing crafted ICMP packets. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThe overflow occurs at net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385[0m[39m, where code reads `pkt->icmp->type` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mor [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mits replacement in the patched version, `in_icmp->type`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m beyond the allocated [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload buffer.[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mA patch was applied to:[0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Introduce an explicit check that `pkt->pay.len >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`[0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Derive an ICMP header pointer from `pkt->pay.buf` [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`in_icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Clip the payload length when building a reply[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- Populate and checksum an outgoing ICMP echo reply[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mAfter rebuilding and rerunning the fuzzer, the same ASan error appeared at the same[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msource location, indicating that the patch did not prevent the out-of-bounds read.[0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Description[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Initial Issue  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The fuzzer command [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`run_fuzzer fuzz -[0m[33mruns[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m100[0m[39m [0m[35m/[0m[95mtestcase[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m triggered a [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheap-buffer-overflow in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mmg_tcpip_if*, pkt*[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` at net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - ASan’s stack trace shows that the overflow is a [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m-byte read immediately after [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39ma [0m[1;36m34[0m[39m-byte heap allocation [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`[0m[1;36m0x504000000150[0m[39m`–`[0m[1;36m0x504000000172[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The allocation originates from `LLVMFuzzerTestOneInput`, which calls `malloc` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mto set up `pkt->pay.buf` or an equivalent buffer.  [0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No assumptions about higher-level causes were made; the failure is [0m            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mreproducible with a minimal input.[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. Patch Attempt  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - At line [0m[1;36m380[0m[39m of `src/net_builtin.c`, the code was refactored to:  [0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Check `pkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and return early to avoid reading[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpast the buffer.  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Compute `in_icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.buf` and test its `type` field. [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Clip trailing data [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`data_len`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m so that copy operations fit within [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`ifp->tx.len - hlen`.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     • Build and checksum the outgoing ICMP reply explicitly.  [0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar dispatch changes were made in IPv4/IPv6 receive paths [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip`, [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_ip6`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m to invoke `rx_icmp` instead of manual casts.[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Patch Result  [0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - A subsequent fuzzing run reproduced the same heap-buffer-overflow at [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mnet_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:385:18[0m[39m.  [0m                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The sanitizer output is nearly identical, indicating the guard `pkt->pay.len <[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` did not catch the condition that leads to the read.  [0m          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The address and allocation region are unchanged, confirming that the code path[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39minto `rx_icmp` still executes with insufficient payload length.[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Areas for Further Investigation  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The initialization and meaning of `pkt->pay.len` and `pkt->pay.buf`—in [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mparticular how `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` sets these fields when parsing IPv4 and IPv6 headers.  [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The interaction between IP header parsing [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`rx_ip`, `rx_ip6`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and ICMP [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdispatch, which may incorrectly establish `pay.len` or buffering boundaries.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - The exact offset and size calculations for copying or reading `struct icmp` [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfields: verify that `pkt->pay.len` reflects the actual available bytes after the IP[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader, not the raw packet length.  [0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Potential discrepancies in Ethernet/IP header length computations [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`ihl` [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mextraction, option handling[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m that could shift the start of the ICMP payload.[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mBy examining these code sections, one can gain a holistic understanding of why [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`rx_icmp` is still operating on undersized buffers and avoid out‐of‐bounds [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39maccesses.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Initial Issue Log[0m                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mHere is the initial issue log of the codebase:[0m                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<issue>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m419[0m[39m:      [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&lease, p + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m, [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mlease[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m421[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mp[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m0[0m[1;39m][0m[39m == [0m[1;36m53[0m[39m && p[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m && p + [0m[1;36m6[0m[39m < end[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m[39m  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Msg Type[0m           [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m424[0m[39m:    p += p[0m[1;39m[[0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m][0m[39m + [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m;[0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m425[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m426[0m[39m:  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Process message type, RFC-[0m[1;36m1533[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m9.4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m; RFC-[0m[1;36m2131[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m3.1[0m[39m, [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m                    [2m                [0m

[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m882[0m[39m:  [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x800[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m883[0m[39m:    pkt.ip = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m884[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m885[0m[39m:    [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncate frame to what IP header tells us[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m886[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m < pkt.raw.len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m887[0m[39m:      pkt.raw.len = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;35mmg_ntohs[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m888[0m[39m:    [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m889[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;  [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Truncated[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m890[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver >> [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m != [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                           [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Not IP[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m894[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<code>[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39msrc/net_builtin.[0m[1;92mc:891[0m[39m-[0m[1;36m893[0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m891[0m[39m:    if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m                                   [0m[35m/[0m[35m/[0m[39m Handle [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mIPv4 options[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m892[0m[39m:        [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m*[0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m893[0m[39m:    else[0m                                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m```[0m                                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode[0m[39m>[0m                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mcode_snippets[0m[39m>[0m                                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m## Fix Strategy[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<fix_strategy>[0m                                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m1[0m[39m. Overview and Root Cause  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   After the initial and subsequent patch attempts, `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` still dereferences [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpacket data beyond its allocated buffer because:  [0m                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   a[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m The IPv4 dispatch path does not fully verify that the entire IP header [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39mincluding options[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and ICMP header fit in `pkt.raw.len` before slicing the [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpayload.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   b[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m There is no unified, single payload‐slicing [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mkpay`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m in the ICMP receive [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpath; instead, legacy code in `rx_ip` and `rx_ip6` performed mini‐checks and then [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdid a second `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, leading to stale or incorrect `pkt->pay` [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfields.  [0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   c[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m Even with a guard in `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, malformed packets can slip through the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdispatch code so that `pkt->pay.buf` or `pkt->pay.len` do not actually reflect a [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mfull ICMP header, causing the very first access of `in_icmp->type` to overflow.[0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m2[0m[39m. High-Level Fix Strategy  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   A. Canonicalize payload slicing so that `pkt->pay.buf` always points to the [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m_start_ of the ICMP header and `pkt->pay.len` to the exact number of bytes [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mremaining [0m[1;39m([0m[39mheader + data[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   B. In the IPv4 path [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`mg_tcpip_rx`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, before calling `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, ensure:  [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. The IP header’s IHL field is between [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m and the raw buffer’s capability.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. `pkt.raw.len >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39meth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen` so that slicing to `pkt.ip + IHL*[0m[1;36m4[0m[39m`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis safe.  [0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Single `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt.ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` to set `pay.buf`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`pay.len`[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mexactly once.  [0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   C. In the IPv6 path, similarly ensure the base `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` is [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mcalled once before `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   D. In `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` itself:  [0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m. Immediately verify `pkt->pay.len >= [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m. Use `struct icmp *in_icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m pkt->pay.buf;` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mnever [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m`pkt->icmp`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m for header fields.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m. Only then read `in_icmp->type`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`code`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`id`[0m[35m/[0m[39m`seq`.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m. Compute `data_len = pkt->pay.len - [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` and clip it [0m       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39magainst transmit buffer space.  [0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m      [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m. Build the ICMP echo‐reply in‐place, checksum, and `[0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m3[0m[39m. Detailed Steps  [0m                                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Step [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m: Patch the IPv4 dispatch in `src/net_builtin.c` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround lines [0m[1;36m882[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m894[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Replace the old  [0m                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m > [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + [0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0xF[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m * [0m[1;36m4[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       else[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         pkt->icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt->icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt, pkt->icmp + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m     with a single, validated slice + dispatch:[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       uint8_t ihl = pkt.ip->ver & [0m[1;36m0x0F[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mihl < [0m[1;36m5[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;                              [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Enforce minimum header [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       size_t ip_hlen = [0m[1;39m([0m[39msize_t[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mihl * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m;[0m                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return; [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Full IP header [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mpresent? *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt.ip + ip_hlen[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;            [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Payload starts at ICMP [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mheader *[0m[35m/[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* other protocols *[0m[35m/[0m                                                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Step [0m[1;36m2[0m[39m: Patch the IPv6 dispatch similarly [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround lines [0m[1;36m876[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m882[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Ensure the code reads:[0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth->type == [0m[1;35mmg_htons[0m[1;39m([0m[1;36m0x86dd[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         pkt.ip6 = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip6 *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.eth + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.raw.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*pkt.ip6[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[39m&pkt, pkt.ip6 + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt.ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m || pkt.ip6->proto == [0m[1;36m58[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;39m}[0m[39m else [0m[1;39m{[0m                                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           [0m[35m/[0m[39m* UDP, TCP, etc. *[0m[35m/[0m                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   Step [0m[1;36m3[0m[39m: Refactor `[0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` [0m[1;39m([0m[39maround lines [0m[1;36m382[0m[39m–[0m[1;36m390[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m:[0m                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - At function entry, drop all uses of `pkt->icmp`; instead:[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       static void [0m[1;35mrx_icmp[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct mg_tcpip_if *ifp, struct pkt *pkt[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Must have at least a full ICMP header *[0m[35m/[0m                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mpkt->pay.len < [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m return;[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         struct icmp *in_icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mpkt->pay.buf;[0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Only handle Echo Request [0m[1;39m([0m[33mtype[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m8[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m destined to us *[0m[35m/[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39min_icmp->type != [0m[1;36m8[0m[39m || pkt->ip == NULL ||[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m             pkt->ip->dst != ifp->ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m [0m[1;39m{[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m           return;[0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Compute how many bytes we can echo back *[0m[35m/[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t hlen = [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct eth[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct ip[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct [0m      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39micmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t space = ifp->tx.len - hlen;[0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         size_t data_len = pkt->pay.len - [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                      [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         if [0m[1;39m([0m[39mdata_len > space[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m data_len = space;[0m                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Build the reply packet *[0m[35m/[0m                                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         struct ip *out_ip = [0m[1;35mtx_ip[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, pkt->eth->src, [0m[1;36m1[0m[39m, ifp->ip, pkt->ip->src,[0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                                   [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + data_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         struct icmp *out_icmp = [0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp *[0m[1;39m)[0m[1;39m([0m[39mout_ip + [0m[1;36m1[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                       [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Populate Echo Reply header *[0m[35m/[0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         out_icmp->type = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         out_icmp->code = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         out_icmp->id   = in_icmp->id;[0m                                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         out_icmp->seq  = in_icmp->seq;[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Copy payload data safely *[0m[35m/[0m                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mmemcpy[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mout_icmp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*out_icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m                               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchar *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39min_icmp + [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*in_icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m,[0m                                 [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                data_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[35m/[0m[39m* Checksum and send *[0m[35m/[0m                                                    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         out_icmp->csum = [0m[1;36m0[0m[39m;[0m                                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         out_icmp->csum = [0m[1;35mipcsum[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m([0m[39muint16_t *[0m[1;39m)[0m[39mout_icmp,[0m                              [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m                                 [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39m*out_icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m + data_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m         [0m[1;35mether_output[0m[1;39m([0m[39mifp, hlen + data_len[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m;[0m                                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       [0m[1;39m}[0m                                                                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m       ```[0m                                                                          [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m4[0m[39m. Preservation of Existing Functionality  [0m                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - IPv4 options support remains [0m[1;39m([0m[39mwe enforce IHL ≥ [0m[1;36m5[0m[39m and read `IHL * [0m[1;36m4[0m[39m` bytes[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m.  [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - IPv6 fragmentation or [0m[33mproto[0m[39m=[0m[1;36m58[0m[39m [0m[1;39m([0m[39mICMPv6[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m dispatch is unchanged in behavior.  [0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - All other protocols [0m[1;39m([0m[39mUDP, TCP, ARP, DHCP, etc.[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are untouched.  [0m               [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No harness, test code, or external library changes.[0m                            [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m5[0m[39m. Justification  [0m                                                                  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By validating the full IP header length against `pkt.raw.len` _before_ [0m        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mslicing, we eliminate any underflow/overflow in `[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                        [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - By centralizing the ICMP header pointer to `pkt->pay.buf` and performing _one_[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mlength check for `[0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`, we guarantee the first read [0m                [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39m`in_icmp->type`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m is in-bounds.  [0m                                                   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Subsequent reads [0m[1;39m([0m[39m`id`, `seq`, the payload copy[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are bounded by `pkt->pay.len [0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m- [0m[1;35msizeof[0m[1;39m([0m[39mstruct icmp[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m`.  [0m                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - This approach mirrors the safe‐slicing pattern used elsewhere in the code [0m     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;39m([0m[39me.g., DHCP options[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m, preventing any stale pointers or double‐`[0m[1;35mmkpay[0m[1;39m([0m[1;39m)[0m[39m` pitfalls.[0m   [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m6[0m[39m. Potential Side-Effects & Mitigations  [0m                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Packets with a bogus `IHL` [0m[1;39m([0m[39me.g., <[0m[1;36m5[0m[39m or too large[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m are simply dropped, which [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mis acceptable per IP spec for malformed/poisoned traffic.  [0m                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Echo‐request behavior for perfectly valid packets remains identical.  [0m         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - No performance regression: minimal arithmetic and one extra branch in IPv4 [0m    [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mdispatch.[0m                                                                           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [1;36m7[0m[39m. References in Codebase  [0m                                                         [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m   - Similar guard patterns exist in `rx_dhcp_client` [0m[1;39m([0m[39mchecks `end < dhcp+[0m[1;36m1[0m[39m`[0m[1;39m)[0m[39m and [0m  [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39min `mg_tcpip_rx` for ARP/IPv6 truncation. We follow the same principle.[0m             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39mThis unified fix ensures that no matter how the fuzzer crafts the ICMP packet or IP[0m [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39moptions, we cannot read or copy beyond the originally allocated buffer.  [0m           [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m                                                                                             [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         [39m<[0m[35m/[0m[95mfix_strategy[0m[1m>[0m                                                                     [2m                [0m
[2;36m                    [0m         ===Evaluation [33mEnd[0m===                                                                [2m                [0m
[2;36m[12/28/25 01:07:49][0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Prism Supervisor Routing: TeamStatus.EVALUATE -> TeamStatus.END                      ]8;id=631582;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py\[2m__init__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=970044;file:///home/qqor/crete/packages/crete/framework/agent/services/prism/__init__.py#160\[2m160[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                   [0m[2;36m [0m[34mINFO    [0m Deleting environments directory: [35m/home/qqor/crete/.cache/environments/[0m[95mmongoose[0m       ]8;id=130193;file:///home/qqor/crete/scripts/benchmark/__main__.py\[2m__main__.py[0m]8;;\[2m:[0m]8;id=500810;file:///home/qqor/crete/scripts/benchmark/__main__.py#300\[2m300[0m]8;;\

[2;36m                    [0m         [35m/home/qqor/crete/packages/python_oss_fuzz/.oss_fuzz/build/out/[0m[95mmongoose[0m               [2m               [0m
